verses.verse: תִּקְע֨וּ <WH8628> tik-'U Blow שׁוֹפָ֜ר <WH7782> sho-Far ye the trumpet בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> be-tzi-Yon, in Zion וְהָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <WH7321> ve-ha-Ri-'u and sound an alarm בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har mountain קָדְשִׁ֔י <WH6944> kod-shi in my holy יִרְגְּז֕וּ <WH7264> yir-ge-Zu tremble כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei let all the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Surely בָ֥א <WH935> va cometh יוֹם־ <WH3117> yom- for the day יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki Surely קָרֽוֹב׃ <WH7138> ka-Rov. for [it is] nigh at hand
